/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/bitonic_sort.dir/bitonic_sort.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bitonic_sort.dir/common/clutils.cpp.o  -o bitonic_sort   -L/home/walid/OpenCL-parallel-programming/bitonic-sort/OpenCL-ICD-Loader/inc  -L/home/walid/OpenCL-parallel-programming/bitonic-sort/OpenCL-ICD-Loader/inc/CL  -Wl,-rpath,/home/walid/OpenCL-parallel-programming/bitonic-sort/OpenCL-ICD-Loader/inc:/home/walid/OpenCL-parallel-programming/bitonic-sort/OpenCL-ICD-Loader/inc/CL:/home/walid/OpenCL-parallel-programming/bitonic-sort/build/OpenCL-ICD-Loader OpenCL-ICD-Loader/libOpenCL.so.1.2 -lpthread -ldl
